summary: This release focuses on polishing Grove's core writing experience, with particular attention to improving the Markdown editor for a smoother and more reliable drafting process. We've also made important security enhancements under the hood to keep your content safe. While it's primarily a maintenance update, these fixes pave the way for some exciting new features we're building for you next.

fixes: resolve UI bugs in MarkdownEditor and CSRF token flow
update ContentWithGutter to use dompurify instead of isomorphic-dompurify
